text: puokke( mea la ai kat) ban pol tha ao lout. chea karpit nasa puok yeung kuchea anakneasar nei mcheasa robsa anak . puokke nung min ach bahpeal dl anak ban laey . chaur anak noam kruosaear robsa anak chak chenh( pi phoumi nih) now peakkandal yb leuklengte phriyea robsa anak bonnaoh haey komaoy anaknea mneak knongchamnaom puok anak ngeakmeul kraoy aoy saoh proh tearounakamm nung thleak towleu neang dauch avei del puokke( krom robsa lout) nung ttuolorng der . pitabrakd nasa pel sanyea( daktondakamm) robsa puokke ku nowpel tiebaphlu . tae pel tiebaphlu minmen chit mokadl te ryy
